website_summaries.verdict: Offers many of the features consumers love in TomTom GPS systems plus the added convenience of WiFi connectivity that makes downloading updates simple.
pros: Built-in WiFi and hands-free functions allow for communication without taking your hands off the wheel
Pairs easily with smart devices and tracks your traveling habits to predict possible destinations
cons: Takes a little time to set it up, but we think it's worth the effort

customer_reviews.title: suction cup on unit
customer_reviews.text: Suction cup on unit will not stick yo dash mounting disc. Constantly pops off sending the unit flying off the dash.
customer_reviews.author: fuzzie

customer_reviews.title: Best Tom Tom I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a via 1515 this thing is fantastic. The 6-inch screen versus 5-inch screen makes a huge Wi-Fi versus plugging into computer another plus.but my favorite feature is hooking up with my phone and speaking into the phone which then Bluetooth the directions to the Tom Tom. I hardly ever have to type in directions.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Fatta

customer_reviews.title: Good quality GPS
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do. Gets you from point A to point B. I've only found a few instances of streets missing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works almost perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I like the map view and ease of use. But navigation took me off track a few times. Map updates are a little behind.
customer_reviews.author: Beaumont Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to use as the Tom Tom Go
customer_reviews.text: Having bought this new model for my wife, she has used it only a couple of times in the last month. Her grievance is that the interface and settings are nowhere as easy to program as her old Tom Tom Go. Even though the map updates for her older one has now ceased to be available, she still picks up and uses it leaving her new Tom Tom comfort on the dining room shelf
customer_reviews.author: David Edwards and Tina Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Won't get you there
customer_reviews.text: Will just get you vaguely in the area of wherever you are trying to get to. I got this for my parents hoping they would be able to use it since they have trouble with phone GPS but this isn't accurate and takes you to the wrong place most of the time (3 out of 4 times that I tried before I gave up). Just use your phone GPS.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: upon usage, I noticed that you can set warnings up (red light camera, etc). it also lets you know if you are above the speed limit by 5 mph or more. the screen is a great size. again I love it and would quickly recommend it to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Spring

customer_reviews.title: No Voice Control
customer_reviews.text: I have been using TomTom devices for many years and have been very satisfied with the accuracy, traffic reports, and easy to read display. Since my current unit did not have some of the newer features such as web updates and smartphone messages I chose the Go Comfort 6. What I did not realize is that this unit does NOT have voice control...something that I would expect any major GPS manufacturer to provide since all my previous TomTom units had that feature. So much for hands free driving...it is an OK unit but I guess I should have done better research.
customer_reviews.author: D Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Go Comfort 5 is user friendly
customer_reviews.text: The Go Comfort 5 is pretty simple to use once you navigate the screen buttons and know what each one does. The GPS is still not as accurate as Google Maps. The Go Comfort has sent me in the opposite direction of a few addresses that I entered. I was under the impression that the Go Comfort would show traffic in real time. Apparently it only works through an App on your cell phone. Also, the Bluetooth has to be connected through the App. Didn't care for the extra steps. Nevertheless, it works for me for basic navigation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the auto update
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a back up to the car's GPS.. so far works great for the few times I used it
customer_reviews.author: Sean Te

customer_reviews.title: Full access to map!
customer_reviews.text: Map is not displayed until I prompt a destination. I don't need to prompt known locations but still want access to traveled roads which I could do with my older Tom Tom device. If this view is accessible , there is no instructions to explain how it is done. I find the unit difficult to learn, especially when on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Bearce

customer_reviews.title: Great size and display
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Garmin GPS with this and much prefer TomTom's display to Garmin's. Easy set up and mounts well on windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty B

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not vibrant so it's hard to see during the day.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that this screen is harder to see than my old Tom-Tom which has a smaller screen but the print is larger and color contrast much better. Glad I didn’t throw the old one away. We will be using it until it no longer works because this one is useless.
customer_reviews.author: JJ from VT

customer_reviews.title: Good product great value
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and simple set up. Bought for elderly parent and they were able to use after minimal instruction
customer_reviews.author: stevep

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The tom tom is a dinosaur. I have a free app on my smartphone that works must better than this. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: You have an option of adaptive address or by zip code I prefer by zip code the way previous models did.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: You arrived  it on point I don't have  to look around.
customer_reviews.text: Like clear voice everything was on point i had others that leave you guessing.
customer_reviews.author: chico blair

customer_reviews.title: Won't travel without it.
customer_reviews.text: We have older vehicles without GPS and I was tired of using a small phone screen for directions. This is a great unit and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: FLSusan

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Not detailed enough in showing service station ,rest stop, and lodging.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Why why smh
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the fact this unit didn't have a hard case... Have brought Tom tom before case came with it!!! So why should I have buy the case separate??? Smh
customer_reviews.author: Sadeyesjlee

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased with tomtom go confort
customer_reviews.text: I feel the descrition of this gps was misleading. It said hands free driving, lt does not have bluetooth phone connection so you can use your cell phone. You can receive messages but not y'alls
customer_reviews.author: Alan R. Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Ssaves confusion and back tracking.
customer_reviews.text: Still learning to use all features. Great help recently in some on-going construction areas.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn King

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. They love it. Seems to work as expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: tomtom comfort
customer_reviews.text: It works well but give yourself time to set up. it takes a little while.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using TomTom products for some time and have loved them. Not so much with this one. In order to get traffic you have to down load their app (which is a battery and data hog. See app reviews before you buy) If I wanted to use my phone I could just download one of the many map apps that are available. Setup is very confusing. I have been using this one for a while now and questions still keep coming up. It asks to many question while your driving which is very distracting. I suppose there are different pics to change some of these things, that I have not found yet.
customer_reviews.author: R24

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical
customer_reviews.text: The very first time we used the GPS it got us lost. We stopped the car and made sure the address was input correctly and started again, and again we got lost. The third time it finally got us to our destination. By this time I had no faith in it so we returned it and ordered another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bogardus

customer_reviews.title: A Brand you can always trust
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of TomTom for many years. I looked hard at some other manufactures and very glad I stayed with a brand I can trust. The GPS was perfect out of the box and worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone that buys, download the manual to it so you can get all the advantages out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzylg

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Just a terrible product. Navigation reroutes you to one way streets the wrong way, gives you longer routes for no reason. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Amador

customer_reviews.title: Get to where you’re going
customer_reviews.text: My husband goes nowhere without his GPS and this has been a good one
customer_reviews.author: IslandGirl

customer_reviews.title: If you need to know where you are or going get TomTom
customer_reviews.text: Now I don’t have to experience drop signals in rural areas. I love my Tom Tom.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth does not always work
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 or 4 Tomtom GPS over the past several years. I love Tomtom for the real time traffic updates and the full view of the route you are taking. My one problem is that the bluetooth connection from your phone does not always work which disables the traffic function on the GPS. In order to correct this, I have to remove my phone from the GPS and then reinstall it. I do not have a problem with any other bluetooth connection with my phone so I am not sure why this is a problem with Tomtom. My phone is a Galaxy S10 from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: D. Berk

customer_reviews.title: Gas Company Profits from TomTom !
customer_reviews.text: Takes you on a joy ride miles out of your way. I don't know why it simply can't get you from A to B, I'm thinking its designed to eat gas money out of your wallet !
customer_reviews.author: SST

customer_reviews.title: GPS
customer_reviews.text: I like the screen, and how it knows my route so it will ask if I want to go to the next stop. I don't like that it doesn't give the tenth miles in the miles left as my other gps did.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great display
customer_reviews.text: Basic instructions are lacking but set up is relatively easy in order to have voice directions turn by turn you must turn on all of the voice options including foreign streets
customer_reviews.author: William P. Condon

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It runs faster than my older one, definitely a better upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: SLC

customer_reviews.title: GPS
customer_reviews.text: I have had better. The first one was a much better unit. Just using the map is a poor visual aid.
customer_reviews.author: David Galer

customer_reviews.title: Good but lacking Features I expected
customer_reviews.text: First the good. 1. Bright and crisp screen. Large enough to see and decent in sunlight. 2. Audio is loud and clear. 3. Location and POI very good and a bit fun to use. 4. Regular updates of maps. I have had 2 in 3 months. Not so great. 1. Really only one point. No traffic or construction info. Maybe I am missing something but I don't see it. With a dedicated GPS I expect it to be better than my phone in ALL respects. This is a critical gap and one that greatly diminishes the value of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Dykhuis

customer_reviews.title: I have a different view of this GPS as it is too small!
customer_reviews.text: What I did not like about this GPS was the fact that it is too small for those who have sight disabilities. The screen is too small and the ability to maneuver around it was difficult for me. I have another GPS system which is better for me to use. I thought that getting this would bring some new innovations, but in reality it did not. For those who have problems with vision this is not the ideal to get.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Best Tom Tom Owned
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I previously own others Tom Tom GPS the first one was stolen and replaced by a very good one that after 9 years the battery start to fail. I get this one and I love the screen size ( 6 Inches) the accuracy and the wi-fi update that works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Use velcro on the suction cup and your dash to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the mounting suction cup. It won't work. I used 3M velcro in it's place and it worked. This is my 4th Tomtom and they all would not stay with the suction cup unless you put velcro on it and your dash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A WONDERFUL GPS!
customer_reviews.text: This GPS is awesome. The screen size is really nice, it was a breeze to set up and begin using. Save your phone for music and calls because this has you covered. My son used this on a few road trips with his buddies and he said he made his way around effortlessly. I used it to visit old friends in my hometown which has DRASTICALLY developed and changed to the point of it being unrecognizable and I, too, was able to navigate those strange roads with ease. If you have a car that doesn't have one built in, at this price you can purchase this and go anywhere knowing you are in good hands!
customer_reviews.author: NaughtiLiterati

customer_reviews.title: User friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my father but I ended up using myself sometimes too. This way if I'm using the navigation on my phone and I recieve a phone call right when I need to make an important turn I don't get screwed up. There's an app that goes with it but I haven't used it yet. It's very user friendly. My Dad who's not very tech savvy is more than capable of using this. It comes with a car adapter for charging. It's soi easy to use. I haven't done it yet, but you can hook your phone up to the Tom Tom. I highly recommend this, it would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S

customer_reviews.title: Great sized touch screen GPS
customer_reviews.text: We've used this GPS a few times now and have found it to be very accurate. The size of the touch screen is perfect and the mount works really well. The touch screen is very responsive and I think the software is easy to navigate. The battery life is a little short but we tend to leave it plugged in. We have not really tested the traffic feature of the GPS but overall it works well. The software can be a little slow to load.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Good GPS unit
customer_reviews.text: The Tom Tom Smart Car GPS Navigation GO Comfort 5 is a good unit for those who don't have a smartphone with GPS apps. You can pare this with your phone or just use it as a solo GPS (which is what we did). It easily maps routes. The only thing we didn't like was that you have to go all the way back to the beginning to cancel the route. You can't just end it from the screen you're on. It makes it a little difficult to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Hunting Creek

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. The physical attachment allows for placement options and holds tight. Account set up is multiple steps but not too bad. Pairs quickly and easily. Touch screen is about the same as most GPS units- occasional issues with responsiveness but nothing terrible. There is interference between my car Bluetooth and the unit. If the TomTom is on there are regular skips in car audio.
customer_reviews.author: April M. Steenburgh

customer_reviews.title: A down grade from Tomtom go 600
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking to upgrade Tomtom 600 and 620, toooooo bad this is worst Tomtom product. It missing view switch icon, non pinch zoom, no tap to go, MOST important feature makes me avoid Garmin. WHY THEY do that!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SandSea

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and even my 73 year old mother can use it
customer_reviews.text: You know it's simple when even my Mom can do it. We did set it up for her, and put it on the wifi to get the updates, but operationally it's simple. Nice large screen and a far better option than the $1600 in dash nav upgrade for her Mercedes!
customer_reviews.author: Adryenn Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Car GPS Navigation TomTom GO COMFORT 5
customer_reviews.text: Durable and well manufactured. Definitely not a cheap piece of equipment. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kilpatrick

product_meta.title: TomTom Go Comfort 6 with WiFi, 6 inch Display, Lifetime Traffic and Maps, Smart Routing, Destination Prediction and Road Trips
product_meta.description: Comfort at its best. Wi-Fi enabled, fast updates, and phone notifications, the TomTom go comfort gives everything you need to focus on the road and stay connected. In addition, you get TomTom Smart routing, lifetime traffic and regular map updates. Connect with the TomTom My drive mobile app to plan and edit your routes before you get into the car, log on to TomTom road trips to discover, download and edit the best routes to drive around the world.
feature_bullets: Top-Class TomTom Traffic: Time-saving traffic congestion avoidance, with trusted arrival times backed by comprehensive traffic information and real-time updates, all via your TomTom Go Comfort GPS
3-month safety camera alerts: Stay updated, under the speed limit, and safer along the way. Keep going with live services on your gps by switching over to a subscription after your trial ends
Tomtom map updates at no extra cost: see what is going on way up ahead with your go comfort gps; Effortless navigation with routes around road closures and other traffic hassles
Wireless connectivity: Stay updated quickly and easily with the Tomtom go comfort gps. Get regular software and map updates with the convenience of built-in Wi-Fi. No computer needed
Road trips by Tomtom: Supercharge your holidays; Road trips brings you another world of driving and riding experiences created by our road trips community. Sync them easily to your gps and go
Smartphone messages: End the on-the-road distractions; To keep your focus on the road, opt to have your messages read out loud effortlessly via TomTom GO Comfort GPS's functionality

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars109 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: TomTom GO Comfort, Reversible integrated mount, car charger & USB cable for computer, documentation
